mainText:
My heart goes out to Steve's family, and friends, and I pray that his 
life will serve as an example to the world of what one man can do with a 
vision, and the determination to see that vision come to fruition.  He 
leaves this world a better place than it was when he got  here, because 
of his positive contribution to mankind.  I hope to see you on the other 
side Steve.
author: Eric
